data.persona: I work in my lab.  I like to experiment with transmutations.  I use arcane ingredients to make potions.
data.description:
You are in the Alchemists Lab.
The alchemists lab is a hidden, mysterious chamber at the top of the tower. There are all sorts of beakers and potions laid out on wooden tables. Smoke and light emanate from the experiments. A large shelf holds jars of strange ingredients, and in the center of the room there is some sort of huge vat of brewing liquid, bubbling and steaming.
There's a Smoke and light, a huge vat of brewing liquid, a Potion, a shelf, a table, a Jar, an a large ladle, a beaker, a tower, and a vat here.
The crow and the family member are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to put some of the brewing liquid from one vat into the other vat
data.mid_motivation: I need to feed some of the brewing liquid potion to a test subject to see if it will control their mind
data.long_motivation: I want to create an army of people doing my bidding after their minds are controlled by the potion

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: put potion ingredients on huge vat

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use large ladle with huge vat

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give brewing liquid to test subject

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get second test subject from dungeon
